title: New team looking for Solo Laners (Mid/Top), Silver-Gold rank if possible :)
body:
We are starting a ranked 5's team with the goal of at least hitting Gold before the end of season 5 and if we reach that goal we will continue on to as high as we can go! At the moment we have a solid bot-lane and Jungle but we are lacking Solo-laners. The main thing we are looking for is the ability to be a team player and communicate well so we can focus our efforts, have more fun and get better results. Thus climbing together as fast as possible! {{item:3270}} 

If you would like to play with us, leave your IGN, the lane you want to play in and some of the main champions you play in that role in a comment and we will get back to you for a game or two when we are all online. The hours we mostly play are late-night to early morning so if that works for you, even better. And one more thing, if you have a duo that plays in the other role we are looking for and is also looking for a team that would be even better! :D  (synergy!)
